entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
